Service.name: Material Support
Service.description: Provision of essential items like blankets, hygiene products, and food.

Service.name: Legal Assistance
Service.description: Help with legal matters including asylum applications, CNDA appeals, and other legal challenges.

Service.name: Social Support
Service.description: Assistance with social integration, including access to social services and housing.

Service.name: Medical Support
Service.description: Provision of healthcare services including medical check-ups, vaccinations, and emergency care.

Service.name: Psychological Support
Service.description: Mental health services including counseling and support for trauma.

Service.name: Accommodation Assistance
Service.description: Help with finding emergency and long-term housing solutions.

Service.name: Day Care Services
Service.description: Provision of daytime shelter with access to showers, food, and rest.

Service.name: HIV Testing
Service.description: Rapid testing for HIV, Hepatitis B, and Hepatitis C, provided by medical professionals.
